review: Great experience! It was my first time ever visiting a dentist.  I had a general checkup including cleaning , polishing and filling of two cavities. The doctor and her team were very patient in explaining the procedure and in giving the instructions. Overall, they ensured minimal discomfort and best possible result. Looking forward to my next regular check-up.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Dear Falguni Doctor, I am always thoroughly impressed by your expertise and kindness during my appointments. The office staff is also extremely welcoming and warm. I really appreciate all of your help. Because you‚Äôre such a good and thoughtful dentist, none of my family members fear going to their appointments to see you. That speaks volumes and I really appreciate it.

Most of your patients won‚Äôt know how good they have it until they go and see someone else. Too bad for them. You do magnificent work through your dental practice.
Thank you for being a truly spectacular dentist. I am filled with gratitude that you are always eager to readily help me out whenever I need it. I felt completely safe with you in charge. 

Excellent ****** *** patience
reply_text:
Thanks for your kind words Tina 
Really thanks for complete trust in my treatment plan and diagnosis

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Wisdom Tooth Extraction, Teeth cleaning & polishing,
review:
Dr. Falguni Shah is an excellent and incredibly gentle dentist. She listens to her patients and does not recommend unnecessary dental procedures. She took the time to explain every procedure she was doing

She is the best and professional with work, made me comfertable for Wisdom tooth extraction and Polishing of teeth, taken her services more than three times 

She and her staff creates a relaxing ambience prior to any procedure being performed. I find this to be a must have for those who do not like going to the dentist!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am visiting doctor Falguni's clinic for the last 25 years regularly. Mostly once or twice a year. I am so much happy with her friendly nature and professional service. Always very polite and give enough time to explain and to understand our problems. Also her staff members are very professional and well behaved. Finally charges wise I guess she is very reasonable. Honestly speaking I have never checked any where because I am fully satisfied with her services.
